banner.Content: For Tailwind CSS v3 docs, [**click here**](https://v1.inspira-ui.com).

nav.GettingStartedDescription: Introduction to Inspira UI and its core concepts.
nav.InstallationDescription: Follow the step-by-step guide to install Inspira UI in your project.
nav.ComponentsDescription: Explore all available components and their usage.
nav.V1DocsDescription: Docs for using Inspira UI with Tailwind CSS v3.

home.IntegrateWithYourFavouriteUIframework: Integrate with your favourite UI framework
home.GetStartedAndStartBuildingAwesomeUI: Get started and start building awesome UI

ui.title: UI Component Playground
ui.description: Review every base component with multiple variants, sizes, and accessibility states.

hints.checkbox: You can mark more than one preference.
hints.disabledOption: Some options are unavailable right now.
hints.radio: Choose the plan that fits best.

notes.autofocus: Auto-focus is applied to show the focus style.
notes.disabledChoice: One option is disabled to demonstrate aria-disabled.

sample.multiline: Let the team know how this feels.
sample.longerText: This textarea grows as you type so reviewers can stress-test the auto-grow behaviour.

buttons.title: Buttons
buttons.description: Primary actions and secondary button styles.

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.description: Text inputs and textareas with validation states.

toggles.title: Toggles
toggles.description: Checkboxes and switches for binary choices.

selectors.title: Selectors
selectors.description: Select menus and radio groups for choosing options.

wrappers.title: Form wrappers
wrappers.description: FormField wrapper integrating labels, hints, and errors.

sections.buttonVariantsDescription: Each button variant rendered across small, medium, and large sizes.
sections.buttonStatesDescription: Loading, disabled, icon, and block button examples.
sections.inputTypesDescription: BaseInput with different HTML input types and clearable behaviour.
sections.inputStatesDescription: Focused, success, error, and disabled input states.
sections.textareaStatesDescription: Resizable textarea variations with hints and disabled view.
sections.checkboxesDescription: Checked, indeterminate, and disabled checkbox states.
sections.selectsDescription: Single, multi-select, and disabled options examples.
sections.radiosDescription: Vertical and horizontal radio group layouts with keyboard support.
sections.formFieldsDescription: Composable wrapper showing labels, hints, errors, and nested controls.

auth.requiredError: Please enter your email and password.
auth.invalidError: We couldn't sign you in with those details. Please try again.
auth.success: You have been signed in successfully.
auth.errorGeneric: Something went wrong while signing you in.
auth.socialTitle: Sign in with your favorite provider
auth.socialSubtitle: We'll redirect you to finish authentication.

hero.title: See what's happening across BroWorld
hero.description: Follow community highlights, discover new resources, and keep up with what builders are shipping right now.

composer.title: Share something with the community
composer.subtitle: Start a conversation and inspire other builders.
composer.label: Your message
composer.placeholder: What would you like to talk about?
composer.success: Your post has been published successfully!
composer.error: We couldn't publish your post. Please try again.

posts.reactionError: We couldn't react to this post. Please try again.

actions.editDescription: Update the details of your post below.
actions.deleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. The post will be removed for everyone.
actions.editSuccessDescription: Your changes have been saved successfully.
actions.editErrorDescription: We couldn't update this post. Please try again.
actions.deleteSuccessDescription: The post has been removed from the feed.
actions.deleteErrorDescription: We couldn't delete this post. Please try again.
actions.followErrorDescription: We couldn't follow this author. Please try again.

comments.label: Join the discussion
comments.placeholder: Share your thoughts with the community...
comments.error: We couldn't add your comment. Please try again.
comments.empty: No comments yet. Be the first to start the conversation!
comments.replyError: We couldn't publish your reply. Please try again.
comments.reactionError: We couldn't react to this comment. Please try again.

weather.title: Rain ahead
weather.subtitle: Get ready for a rainy day with light winds.
weather.tip: Don't forget your umbrella to stay dry.

sidebar.title: Stay connected
sidebar.subtitle: Resources to keep up with the BroWorld community.

community.title: Join the community
community.description: Chat with other builders, share ideas, and get instant help.

docs.title: Browse the docs
docs.description: Learn how to make the most of BroWorld components in your projects.

contribute.title: Contribute an article
contribute.description: Share your insights with the community and help others grow.

register.requirement2: Should include numbers or special characters for extra security.
register.errorTerms: You must agree to the terms and conditions.
register.errorGeneric: Something went wrong while creating your account.
register.success: Your account has been created successfully.
register.termsIntro: By creating an account you confirm that you understand and accept our policies.
register.termsPoint1: We only use your information to create and secure your account.
register.termsPoint2: You can update your notification preferences at any time.
register.termsPoint3: Deleting your account will remove your data from our active systems within 30 days.
register.termsOutro: Please contact our support team if you have any questions about how we handle your data.
